name: Centip3De
description:
Centip3De is a chilling take on the hit-classic arcade game; Centipede! In this 3D Shooter you are the lone survivor of your destroyed space expedition rocket on a lonesome planet. Or so you thought was lonesome.

They circle you quickly, like a pack of wolves intimidating it's prey..

How long can you resist being torn apart by these nightmarish monstrosities?
